Key Match Events: Nick Castellanos was hit by a pitch from Tampa Bay Rays reliever Edwin Uceta, causing benches to clear
Phillies scored five runs in the bottom of the eighth inning
Trea Turner hit a two-run homer
Post-Match Reflections: Nick Castellanos called out Edwin Uceta for intentionally throwing at him
MLB suspended Edwin Uceta for three games and manager Kevin Cash for one game
Miscellaneous Highlights: Philadelphia Phillies took over the best record in baseball
Tampa Bay will be without their skipper and one of their top bullpen pieces for the finale on Wednesday
Philadelphia is dealing with multiple injuries including Kyle Schwarber, Alec Bohm, Austin Hays, Edmundo Sosa, and J.T. Realmuto
